reference.title: title.only.topic.title.class.spec Ant parameter
reference.shortdesc: Specifies the @class attribute value to use for titles for title-only topics generated from topicheads.

section.p: Any valid @class value for a topic title (e.g., "- topic/title mytopic/mytitle ").

The EPUB standard requires that all navigation ToC entries point to a content object. The EPUB transform handles this by generating title-only topics for each topichead in the map. These generated topics are then processed by the normal HTML generation process.

If you have a topic title specialization that produces custom HTML results that you want to use for these generated topics, you can use this parameter to generate titles of that type. Note that this parameter applies to all generated title-only topicsâ€”there is currently no mechanism to get different title types for different map contexts.
